name: Buster
description: Buster took a film projector from the movie theater where he works so he can play around with it like a prop. It's dangerous and highly unprofessional!

gadgets.name: Utility Belt
gadgets.description: Buster heals himself and all nearby allies for 936 health for each ally in his Super charge area.

gadgets.name: Slo-Mo Replay
gadgets.description: Buster's next Lens Flare pulls enemies towards him.

starpowers.name: Blockbuster
starpowers.description: Buster's Lens Flare deals 15% more damage for each ally in his Super charge area.

starpowers.name: Kevlar Vest
starpowers.description: While Montage is active Buster takes 10% less damage and is immune to knockbacks, slows and stuns.

tips: It is recommended for Buster to close the gap between him and the enemy, as Buster's main attack does significantly more damage up close than farther away. Take advantage of bushes, obstacles, or thin choke points to ambush and defeat enemies.
Buster's wide and piercing attack makes it very effective against grouped-up enemies. Use this to your advantage to charge your Super faster.

When using his Super, make sure to point it in the direction of possible enemy attacks. Remember to strafe in the same direction as the enemy to deflect their attacks and avoid getting hit from the side.
Be mindful when using Buster's Super, as it can be interrupted (unless Buster has his Kevlar Vest Star Power equipped) and will cancel Buster's Super.
Buster's barrier only counterattacks when it is hit, so it is possible to hit him from the side. Attacks from above, such as Barley's main attack, will also not be reflected.

Use his Utility Belt Gadget in more supportive game modes like Gem Grab and Bounty. Buster's Slo-Mo Replay Gadget is handier in more aggressive modes like Brawl Ball, where he can disarm the ball carrier.

If you are facing a Bo, make sure you have the Kevlar Vest Star Power equipped. If you trigger a Bo's Super mine, then activate your Super. If you do so, then you will not be knocked back, and you will withstand more damage.

history.description: Buster became available to play in the Training Cave.
Buster and his Chainsaw skin were added to the game.
Fixed a bug that prevented players from using Wild Card Power Points on Buster.
Buster's health was decreased to 5000 (from 5600).
Buster's main attack damage was decreased to 1580 (from 1700) at close range.
Buster's Super charge rate was decreased slightly.
Buster's Utility Belt Gadget healing was decreased to 500 (from 1000) per ally.
Buster's Slo-Mo Replay Gadget and Kevlar Vest Star Power were added.
Buster's health was decreased to 4800 (from 5000).
Buster's main attack damage was decreased to 1480 (from 1580) at close range.
Buster's facial animations were slightly reworked.
Buster's main attack damage was decreased to 1320 (from 1480) at close range.
The number of hits necessary to charge Buster's Super was increased to 4 hits (from 3) at close range.
Buster's Super duration was decreased to 3 seconds (from 6).
Buster's Kevlar Vest Star Power damage reduction was decreased to 10% (from 20%).
Buster's True Silver and True Gold skins were added.
Chainsaw Buster's main attack and Super visual effects were reworked.
The Crocodile Buster skin was added. It was featured as a Rumble Jungle Heroes skin.
Buster's Utility Belt Gadget healing was increased to 750 (from 500) per ally.
Buster's health was increased to 5200 (from 4800).
Buster's main attack damage was increased to 1440 (from 1320) at close range.
The number of hits necessary to charge Buster's Super was decreased to 3 hits (from 4) at close range.
All Brawlers' health and damage were increased from 5% to 10% with each Power Level.
Buster's main attack damage was decreased to 1400 (from 1440) at close range.
Buster's Utility Belt Gadget healing was decreased to 749 (from 750) per ally but now scales with Power Levels.

Buster's flavor text was changed from "Operating the projector at the movie theater, Buster has his favorite action movies memorized. He dreams to someday become an action hero in his own blockbuster movie." to "Buster took a film projector from the movie theater where he works so he can play around with it like a prop. It's dangerous and highly unprofessional!"
Buster's Slo-Mo Replay Gadget slow was removed.
Buster's rarity was changed to Mythic (from Chromatic).

attack.name: Lens Flare
attack.description: Buster shoots a cone of light from his projector, damaging all enemies within range.

super.name: Montage
super.description: Buster projects a shield in front of him, blocking all enemy projectiles and reflecting the energy back towards enemies.
